title: Is it possible to homeschool a student for the last semester of high school in Texas? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes this is very possible as I personally finished my highschool in this format and know many others who have done the same. Before the current semester ends you would have to Speak with your councelor about your interest in finishing your final semester online and receive permission.Find out which online homeschool program is best for you. (I used Texas Tech Online High School) but there are many different quality programs available.Complete the classes by the time the final semester finishes along with exams.Graduate as you would have normally with the exact same diploma as if you attended school the last semester. Most schools will also let you walk the stage along with the rest of the graduating class but that is up to the principal or super intendant.CONGRATS GRAD CLASS OF 2018!
